synopsis.text: Thus begins the tale of Imagawa Hayao, a 30-year-old bachelor who has yet to experience the thrills of romance or intimacy. When a divine being from the heavens, Daigorou, descends with the sole mission of guiding Hayao through the journey of losing his virginity, an enchanting love story unfurls. As the narrative progresses, Hayao finds himself entangled in a pure and heartfelt connection with a fellow 30-year-old bachelorette, Natsu Andou. This captivating anime, inspired by Mitsuba and Ichijinsha's guidebook "Health and Physical Education for 30-Year-Olds," offers a unique perspective on love and relationships for those who may have thought their chance at love had passed them by.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
